RECON_T Struct Reference

contains data related to wavefront reconstruction and DM fitting. More...

 used for tip/tilt removal from tomographic screens.

 used for tip/tilt removal from DM commands.

 ploc weighting for circle of diam aper.d

 ploc weighting for circle of diam aper.d

 fit weighting in each direction.

 Laplacian square regularization.
spcell * L2save
 save old L2 to update the tomography matrix.

 inverse of atm PSD, to apply Cxx^-1 in Fourier space.
ccell * fftxopd
 temporary storage array to apply invpsd
FDPCG_T * fdpcg
 fdpcg preconditioner data.
spcell * GP
 Gradient operator from HXW.
spcell * HXW
 Ray tracing operator from xloc to ploc for all WFS.

 Like GXtomo.
spcell * GX
 Gradient operator for all WFS from each layer of xloc.
spcell * GXtomo
 GX for tomography.
spcell * GXhi
 GX for high order WFS.
spcell * GXlo
 GX for low order WFs.
spcell * GXfocus
 GX used for focus tracking.
dcell * GXL
 dense GX for low order WFS in MV split tomography.
dcell * MVRngs
 NGS recon for MV split tomography.
dcell * MVModes
 MVST Modes (svd'ed).
spcell * GA
 actuator to wfs grad.
spcell * GAlo
 GA of low order WFS.
spcell * HXF
 ray tracing propagator from xloc to ploc for fitting directions.
spcell * HA
 ray tracing from aloc to ploc for fitting directions.
dcell * TT
 TT modes for LGS WFS.
dcell * PTT
 pinv of TT for tt removal from LGS gradients
dcell * DF
 Differential focus modes for LGS wfs.
dcell * TTF
 Concatenation of TT and DF.
dcell * PTTF
 pinv of TTF
spcell * ZZT
 single point piston constraint in tomography.
dcell * NW
 null modes for DM fit.
spcell * actslave
 force slave actuators to have similar value to active neighbor ones.
double fitscl
 strength of fitting FLM low rank terms (vectors)
spcell * saneai
 inverse of sanea^2 in radian^-2
dmat * neam
 subaperture averaged nea for each wfs
double neamhi
 average of neam for high order wfs.
MUV_T RR
 tomography right hand side matrix, solve RL*x=RR*y
MUV_T RL
 tomography left hand side matrix
MUV_T FR
 DM fit right hand size matrix, solve FL*x=FR*y.
MUV_T FL
 DM fit left hand size matrix.
MOAO_T * moao
 for MOAO DM fitting
dcell * RFlgs
 focus reconstruction from each LGS grad
dcell * RFngs
 focus reconstruction from NGS grad.
dcell * RFtomo
 focus recon from reconstructed X.
int * skipwfs
 skip the wfs in split tomo.
NGSMOD_T * ngsmod
 ngs mod in ad hoc split tomography.
CN2EST_T * cn2est
 For Cn2 Estimation.
int * xdim
 length of each xloc layer.
int * gdim
 length of gradient vector for each wfs.
int lowfs_gtilt
 =1 if any low order wfs use gtilt in recon/simu
int npsr
 number of reconstructor phase screens.
int ndm
 number of DMs;
int has_ttr
 whether there is any tip/tilt removed WFS
int has_dfr
 whether there is any differential focus removed WFS
int nthread
 number of threads in reconstruction.
int calc_invpsd
 Whether we need to compute inverve of psd.

Detailed Description

contains data related to wavefront reconstruction and DM fitting.

Field Documentation

double RECON_T::r0

r0 used in reconstruction.

may get updated in cn2 estimation

double RECON_T::l0

l0 used in reconstruction.

may get updated in cn2 estimation

dmat* RECON_T::ht

height of the layers to do tomography.

dmat* RECON_T::wt

weight of the layers to to tomography.

may get updated in cn2 estimation

dmat* RECON_T::os

over sampling of the layers.

dmat* RECON_T::dx

sampling in meter of the layers

reconstructed pupil

Size of pmap used to build ploc.

size of pmap used to build ploc

reconstructed atmosphere grid.

size of xmap used to build xloc

size of xmap used to build xloc

index array to embed opd on xloc to square array of xloc_nx*xloc_ny

used for tip/tilt removal from tomographic screens.

actuator grid

size of amap used to build aloc

used for tip/tilt removal from DM commands.

dsp* RECON_T::W0

ploc weighting for circle of diam aper.d

dmat* RECON_T::W1

ploc weighting for circle of diam aper.d

dmat* RECON_T::fitwt

fit weighting in each direction.

spcell* RECON_T::L2

Laplacian square regularization.

spcell* RECON_T::L2save

save old L2 to update the tomography matrix.

dcell* RECON_T::invpsd

inverse of atm PSD, to apply Cxx^-1 in Fourier space.

ccell* RECON_T::fftxopd

temporary storage array to apply invpsd

FDPCG_T* RECON_T::fdpcg

fdpcg preconditioner data.

spcell* RECON_T::GP

Gradient operator from HXW.

GX=GP*H.

spcell* RECON_T::HXW

Ray tracing operator from xloc to ploc for all WFS.

spcell* RECON_T::HXWtomo

Like GXtomo.

spcell* RECON_T::GX

Gradient operator for all WFS from each layer of xloc.

spcell* RECON_T::GXtomo

GX for tomography.

excluding NGS in split tomography

spcell* RECON_T::GXhi

GX for high order WFS.

spcell* RECON_T::GXlo

GX for low order WFs.

spcell* RECON_T::GXfocus

GX used for focus tracking.

dcell* RECON_T::GXL

dense GX for low order WFS in MV split tomography.

dcell* RECON_T::MVRngs

NGS recon for MV split tomography.

dcell* RECON_T::MVModes

MVST Modes (svd'ed).

spcell* RECON_T::GA

actuator to wfs grad.

spcell* RECON_T::GAlo

GA of low order WFS.

spcell* RECON_T::HXF

ray tracing propagator from xloc to ploc for fitting directions.

spcell* RECON_T::HA

ray tracing from aloc to ploc for fitting directions.

dcell* RECON_T::TT

TT modes for LGS WFS.

dcell* RECON_T::PTT

pinv of TT for tt removal from LGS gradients

dcell* RECON_T::DF

Differential focus modes for LGS wfs.

dcell* RECON_T::TTF

Concatenation of TT and DF.

dcell* RECON_T::PTTF

pinv of TTF

spcell* RECON_T::ZZT

single point piston constraint in tomography.

dcell* RECON_T::NW

null modes for DM fit.

spcell* RECON_T::actslave

force slave actuators to have similar value to active neighbor ones.

double RECON_T::fitscl

strength of fitting FLM low rank terms (vectors)

spcell* RECON_T::saneai

inverse of sanea^2 in radian^-2

dmat* RECON_T::neam

subaperture averaged nea for each wfs

double RECON_T::neamhi

average of neam for high order wfs.

MUV_T RECON_T::RR

tomography right hand side matrix, solve RL*x=RR*y

MUV_T RECON_T::RL

tomography left hand side matrix

MUV_T RECON_T::FR

DM fit right hand size matrix, solve FL*x=FR*y.

MUV_T RECON_T::FL

DM fit left hand size matrix.

MOAO_T* RECON_T::moao

for MOAO DM fitting

dcell* RECON_T::RFlgs

focus reconstruction from each LGS grad

dcell* RECON_T::RFngs

focus reconstruction from NGS grad.

dcell* RECON_T::RFtomo

focus recon from reconstructed X.

int* RECON_T::skipwfs

skip the wfs in split tomo.

(NGS)

NGSMOD_T* RECON_T::ngsmod

ngs mod in ad hoc split tomography.

CN2EST_T* RECON_T::cn2est

For Cn2 Estimation.

length of each xloc layer.

int* RECON_T::gdim

length of gradient vector for each wfs.

int RECON_T::lowfs_gtilt

=1 if any low order wfs use gtilt in recon/simu

int RECON_T::npsr

number of reconstructor phase screens.

int RECON_T::ndm

number of DMs;

int RECON_T::has_ttr

whether there is any tip/tilt removed WFS

int RECON_T::has_dfr

whether there is any differential focus removed WFS

int RECON_T::nthread

number of threads in reconstruction.

int RECON_T::calc_invpsd

Whether we need to compute inverve of psd.
